sentences.english: Assistant General Manager of a five-star hotel in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 深圳某五星级酒店总经理助理。

sentences.english: What kind of hotel would you like, five-star or something simpler?
sentences.chinese: 您愿意要什么样的酒店，五星级的还是普通些的？

sentences.english: I'll shoot the works this time by giving you a treat in a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 这次我也豁出去了，到五星级大饭店请你们吃一顿。

sentences.english: And we spent the night at a five-star hotel in Jiangmen city.
sentences.chinese: 我们在江门市一家五星级酒店过了夜。

sentences.english: All five-star hotels offer conference facilities.
sentences.chinese: 五星级酒店都提供会议设施。

sentences.english: Public toilets will be rated from one to five stars.
sentences.chinese: 公厕评定将从一星级一直到五星级。

sentences.english: I'll shoot the works this time by giving you a goody in a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 这次我也豁进来了，到五星级大饭店请你们吃一顿。

sentences.english: Today's chef is the chief chef at a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 今天为宴会掌厨的是五星级酒店的大厨。

sentences.english: This five-star Laguna Beach hotel is an unforgettable spot to rejuvenate.
sentences.chinese: 这家五星级拉古纳海滩酒店是振兴一个难忘的地方。

sentences.english: VIP suite with luxury facilities in a star-rated hotel.
sentences.chinese: 普通人住不起五星级饭店的总统套房。

sentences.english: Beijing five-star recreation center Qingqing grass lift for your day's fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 北京五星级清清草康体中心为您解除一天疲劳。

sentences.english: All the people gave her pesto five star review.
sentences.chinese: 所有的人都给了她的香蒜酱汁五星级的点评。

sentences.english: Among them, declare area of 5A class scene to must make toilet of travel of 5 stars stage.
sentences.chinese: 其中，申报5A级景区就必须建造五星级旅游厕所。

sentences.english: The Hyatt hotel chain plans to turn 44 floors into a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 凯悦酒店则计划把其中的44层建成一座五星级酒店。

definition: the five visible planets, namely: Mercury 水星, Venus 金星, Mars 火星, Jupiter 木星, Saturn 土星

pinyin: Huang2 guan1 Jia4 ri4 Jiu3 dian4
